descriptionHtml:
[img]http://abload.de/img/main29ykzn.jpg[/img]﻿

Hey there traveler,

i made this ENB cause i always thought Skyrim is too dark...atleast at daytime.
This is a bright (and in my oppinion) performace friendly ENB.

This is for ENB 262
Download the ENB from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0262.html]http://enbdev.com[/url]﻿
Take the d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe and put in Skyrim main folder (where Skyrim.exe and Launcher.exe are located)
Drag and drop my ENB in fain folder (where Skyrim.exe and Launcher.exe are located)
Change ReservedMemorySizeMb=256 (recommendet)  and VideoMemorySizeMb= to your system.

Have fun =)

[u][b]Please dont forget to endorse if you like the ENB[/b][/u]


My gaming PC
Core I5 2500K @ 4.2Ghz
8GB DDR3 1333Mhz
Gigabyte UD4-B3
XFX ATI R9 270X
WIN 7.1 64Bit

[youtube]zp7SnYRgHsghttp[/youtube]

I have around 35 to 50 Frames at 1920x1080
I think this information should everbody incude in the enb text!!!!!!
